segments.text: Wake up , it's time for school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so tired . Let me sleep for five more minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to get up and get ready for school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but just five more minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't let you go back to sleep , because you won't wake back up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I promise I'll wake up , in five minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You still need to eat breakfast , take a shower , and get dressed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I realize that , and I can do all that when I wake up in five minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want you to be late for school today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not going to be late today .
segments.speaker: S2
